marklogic.body:
Romney will not save America from the slow erosion of Liberty and the Constitution, he will just turn the Heat back down to a slow boil.
Romney might buy us some more time but unless we all face the reality that the Federal government is now a permant politcal class unconstrained by the law, we will be known as the generation that lost America.
By submitting to their replacement of Obama with Romney, all we have done is put our heads in the sand, avoided the fight and left our children and grandchildren to stand up ot the fight or to live like slaves to these elites.
Patrick Henry did "smell a rat". Because he and others on that, we have the Bill of Rights. We smell a rat, it is Romeny. Will we Act?
